action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a group of people playing a game of tic-tac-toe on a chalkboard. There are three people in the image, each with a different colored marker. One person is using a red marker, another is using a green marker, and the third person is using a yellow marker. The chalkboard is divided into nine squares, with three squares in each column. The squares are numbered from one to nine. The person using the red marker has made a mark in the first square. The person using the green marker has made a mark in the second square. The person using the yellow marker has made a mark in the third square.
continue
